sentences.en: A synchronous motor drives the measuring bob at a constant rotational speed.
sentences.cn: 同步马达驱动测锤以恒速旋转.

sentences.en: Each state represents a different combination of rotational, vibrational, or orbital energy for the molecule.
sentences.cn: 每个态均表示分子的旋转, 振动或轨道能量的不同组合.

sentences.en: Experts say that rotational grazing can save money time.
sentences.cn: 专家说轮流放牧可以随时的省钱.

sentences.en: Have discussed straining wave method of the rotational speed measurement.
sentences.cn: 并讨论了转速测量数据的滤波方法.

sentences.en: However, heating energizes the vibrational, rotational, and electronic motions all at once.
sentences.cn: 但是, 加热会一下子把振动 、 转动和电子运动统统加强.

sentences.en: I came to understand scoliosis as having a complex rotational dynamic, arising out of a growth process, albeit one that has gone awry.
sentences.cn: 我开始理解脊柱侧凸是一种复杂的转动动力，源于生长过程那块早已弯曲的骨头。

sentences.en: Microwave spectroscopist have determined the rotational constants for many molecules.
sentences.cn: 微波波谱学家已经确定了许多分子的转动常数.

sentences.en: Mundry uses the same principle for three layered systems with linear expansion or rotational symmetry.
sentences.cn: 穆恩德瑞将同一原理应用于具线性延伸或转动对称的三层状系统.

sentences.en: Obviously much further quantification of the blackbone rotational parameters affecting termination is possible.
sentences.cn: 显然,使主键转动参数对终止速度的影响更定量化是可能的.

sentences.en: Rotational energy states have the least energy.
sentences.cn: 转动能态具有最小的能量.

sentences.en: The length refers to the length of the arm; because the throwing motion is rotational from the shoulder out, the atlatl simply lengthens the arm to increase the throwing speed and force.
sentences.cn: 长度是指胳膊长度，因为抛扔运动是以肩膀关节为中心的旋转运动，这样一来，飞镖投掷器只不过是手臂的延长，因此，增加了投掷的速度和力量。

sentences.en: The rotational inertia of some uniformed bodies is obtained without doing integral.
sentences.cn: 对于某些均质刚体不用积分算出其转动惯量的表示式.

sentences.en: The rotational levels of the ground vibrational level may be depopulated by radiation.
sentences.cn: 基态振动能级的各转动能级的粒子数可能因幅射而减少.

sentences.en: The smallest energy transitions are between rotational levels; the next smallest between vibrational levels.
sentences.cn: 在转动能级之间的能量跃迁最小, 其次是振动能级之间的跃迁.

sentences.en: We will talk more about growtational rotational grazing next week.
sentences.cn: 我们将在下周更多的讨论轮流放牧.

sentences.en: We will talk more about rotational grazing next week.
sentences.cn: 下周我们将更多地探讨轮牧.

sentences.en: With some limitations, this is true also of rotational degrees of freedom.
sentences.cn: 在某些限定条件下, 这一说法对转动自由度也成立.

words.tran_cn: 可旋转的；可转动的；可循环的
旋转的；使回转的；轮流的；引起旋转的
旋转式机器；[动力] 转缸式发动机
旋转；使…转动；循环（rotate的过去分词）

phrases.tran_cn: 转动惯量；转动惯性；惯性矩
旋转速度，角速度；圆周速度
自转速度；转动速度；围速
